MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar affecting properties in Libry Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.16pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Kirkholm Craig Drive substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.10pm on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
